== Desktop ==
== Desktop ==
â
Mythbuntu uses the [[Xfce]] desktop interface by default, but allows for the installation of the default desktop interfaces from [[Ubuntu (Linux distribution)|Ubuntu]], [[Kubuntu]], and [[Xubuntu]]. The user can install ubuntu-desktop, kubuntu-desktop, or xubuntu-desktop through the Mythbuntu Control Centre. This allows Mythbuntu to provide the user with the default [[GNOME]], [[KDE]], or [[Xfce]] interfaces from Ubuntu.
+
Mythbuntu uses the [[Xfce]] desktop interface by default, but allows for the installation of the default desktop interfaces from [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]], [[Kubuntu]], and [[Xubuntu]]. The user can install ubuntu-desktop, kubuntu-desktop, or xubuntu-desktop through the Mythbuntu Control Centre. This allows Mythbuntu to provide the user with the default [[GNOME]], [[KDE]], or [[Xfce]] interfaces from Ubuntu.
== Mythbuntu Control Centre ==
== Mythbuntu Control Centre ==
